title: Power Sculpt
description: A high-intensity strength training class designed to sculpt your muscles and boost your energy. Perfect for all fitness levels.

title: Spin & Sculpt
description: A calming mix of yoga and meditation techniques to help you find balance, strength, and flexibility.

title: Rhythm Revolution
description: Dance your way to fitness in this fun and energizing class set to upbeat music.

title: Fitness Fiesta
description: An energetic group workout combining cardio and bodyweight exercises to the rhythm of lively music.

title: Warrior Workout
description: Push your limits in this intense circuit training class that builds strength and endurance.

title: Muscle Stretching
description: A heart-pumping workout focused on cardio exercises to boost stamina and burn calories.

title: Body Blast
description: Full-body strength and conditioning exercises for a complete fitness boost.

title: Beginner Pilates
description: Focus on your core muscles with a mix of Pilates, yoga, and functional movements.

title: Yoga Flow
description: A rejuvenating yoga session that flows through postures to improve flexibility and inner peace.
An intense, high-energy workout combining martial arts techniques with cardio movements. Perfect for burning calories, boosting stamina, and building strength while unleashing your inner warrior.
A comprehensive full-body workout designed to tone and sculpt muscles, improve endurance, and enhance flexibility using a variety of equipment and bodyweight exercises.
A dynamic cardio workout inspired by boxing and kickboxing moves, this class is perfect for improving agility, coordination, and cardiovascular fitness while having fun.
Start your day with calm and clarity through gentle yoga poses, breathing exercises, and mindfulness practices. This session promotes relaxation, flexibility, and mental focus.
A holistic class that blends yoga, Pilates, and tai chi movements to improve posture, core strength, and balance. Ideal for achieving both physical and mental harmony.
